alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Coastal Duval; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Clay; South Central Duval; Western Alachua; Western Clay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 17 at 8:48AM EST until January 17 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29. * WHERE...Bradford, Coastal Duval, Eastern Clay, Eastern Alachua, Western Clay, Western Alachua and South Central Duval Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Appropriate action should be taken to ensure tender vegetation and outdoor pets have adequate protection from the cold temperatures. Young children, the elderly and the homeless are especially vulnerable to the cold. Take measures to protect them.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Coastal Duval; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Clay; South Central Duval; Western Alachua; Western Clay
